content: these sweet popcorn flower stars are a little bit boho and a lot sweet they can be used as ornaments/decorations as motifs that can be joined to make a sweet lap blanket or bed runner or to make pretty bunting from they are also perfect for christmas keepsake gift wrapping perfect for stash-busting with each star using between ~9g/0 28oz to ~15g/0 53oz of yarn depending on star design yarn/hook/gauge pattern pdf includes written instructions for three popcorn star designs the written instructions for one of these designs is also available for free on my blog thanks to the following fabulous testers for your help with testing this pattern shannon maughan @the crafty runner on ig and thecraftyrunner on ravelry emma-joy gilbert @handmadeonahook on ig and fb and em-j87 on ravelry lee neudahl smith @lee_katherine_8 on ig and needlekrafter on ravelry jade taylor @blackholesandunicornscrochet on ig @blackholesandunicornshandmadeandcrochet on fb and jadektaylor on ravelry jo fowkes @fibreandthreads on ig fb and etsy tara lee @fennecfoxco on ig fb and etsy
